sense.name: Go together; fulfill the characteristics of.
sense.examples: All proceedings accorded with the stated mission of the organization. Our ideas accorded and the meeting was adjourned.

sense.name: Allow to have; assign.
sense.commentary: Syntax Includes: NP1[agent] ACCORD NP2[patient] NP1[agent] ACCORD NP2[recipient]
sense.examples: The government accorded full rights and privileges to the new citizens. The FDA accords the label to drugs believed effective but previously untested. The company accords new employees the best health coverage in the industry.
